com.oose2015.group13.frontend.battleship

Class PlayGameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oose2015.group13.frontend.battleship.PlayGameActivity

  • public class PlayGameActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the "main" activity in which a user plays the game. This activity makes calls to the server retrieve the board, the game state, request to make a move, and to place a ship. This activity maintains game state, and refetches is every time the activity is create.

      • placeShip

        public boolean placeShip(java.lang.String pieceID,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> piecePositions)
        Checks to see whether a particular placement of ship is valid. This method makes an HTML API call back to the server to compute whether it is valid. If it is not valid, user must continue to place ships.
        Parameters:
        pieceID - identifies which chiece is moving
        piecePositions - 2D array of integers representing the pieces location
        Returns:
        whether the placement is valid

      • sendReady

        public void sendReady(java.lang.String userID,
                      java.lang.String gameID)
        Sends to server that a user in a game has placed his ships and is ready to play. This method is not called until all of the user's ships have been placed in a valid position.
        Parameters:
        userID - Identifies user to server
        gameID - Identifies game to server

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove(java.lang.String userID,
                        java.lang.String gameID,
                        int toX,
                        int toY)
        Sends to server a move to make a move on the board. Returns false if move is invalid. If not valid, user will loop in make-a-move.
        Parameters:
        userID - Identifies user to server
        gameID - Identifies game to server
        toX - Identifies x coordinate of move/shot
        toY - Identifies y coordinate of move/shot
        Returns:
        whether the move is valid

      • updateGameState

        public void updateGameState(java.lang.String userID,
                            java.lang.String gameID)
        This method is called once every second to fetch the most current game state.
        Parameters:
        userID - Identifies user to server
        gameID - Identifies game to server

      • getGameBoard

        public void getGameBoard(java.lang.String gameID,
                         java.lang.String userID)
        This method is called once, when the activity is created, to fetch the board piece positions from the server.
        Parameters:
        userID - Identifies user to server
        gameID - Identifies game to server
